Question.Subject: Different ways to get in touch with my Blog?
Question.Content:
I have a blog at - http://rurusblog.tumblr.com. And when I ask people to get in touch, they never do. The current ways for people to get in touch are :
e-mail ( rurusblog@live.co.uk ), Twitter ( @rurusblog ), Facebook
But does anyone have any ides for people to get in touch, without really having to sign up for anything.
My blog can use HTML, and I have some understanding of it.
If you have ANY ideas, PLEASE reply!
thank you :D
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You could put in a 'contact me' form that emails you, and is easy to fill in.
http://www.emailmeform.com/
i have used them before, they are quite good. :)
good luck, hope this helps.
